channel.title: Help with magic
channel.description:
Alright, here's my deal.
When i swtich to another magic, like lunar or acnients. It doesn't save:( When I teleport somewhere after changing I'll have to change again, causeing me to have to put a atlar of each in EVERY party of the server. . .
I've tired things to make it auto save, but could someone help me with making acnients and lunar save when you change them.(And so they it doesnt change back to normal right after I teleport somewhere)

item.title: Help with magic
item.dc:creator: @abcpker711 abcpker711
item.description:
@abcpker711 wrote:

You all need to stop flaming eachother. It’s not fun to have a server inwhich you work hard to code, when other people are hipocrits and critisies every little peice of work you do. MoparScape created this website to help players learn how to code, so if they don’t know what to do, don’t make fun of them. Be a friend and help them out. Now, I need help myself, so if someone could check out the topic below, it’d be lovely.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with magic
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:4, topic:337660”][quote author=chippeh link=topic=434062.msg3187130#msg3187130 date=1271878937]
Honestly? You can’t figure out something as basic as this?
Make something like SPB (spellbook)
if (SPB ==1){
NormalSpellbookInterfaceGoesHere
}
if (SPB == 2){
AncientSpellbookInterfaceGoesHere
}
if (SPB == 3){
LunarSpellbookInterfaceGoesHere
}

and trey removing everything else to do with changing spellbooks.
[/quote]
Maybe he is new to coding? Stfu you people are the ones that make people not like moparscape…[/quote]
WtfI was just saying whats that have to do with it. . . I am not a bitch liek most people… so dont talk to me like that Ive helped many people and i do do this shit to people. i was just wondering what it has to do with saving the logs…

Read full topic
